title: MERC Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 15 Assistant Director Posts
description: The Maharashtra Electricity Regulatory Commission (MERC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 15 Assistant Director Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Electrical Engineering and an MBA, can apply for the MERC Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the...
